title: Everything you ever wanted to know about medieval daily life, but were afraid to ask
itunes:title: Everything you ever wanted to know about medieval daily life, but were afraid to ask
itunes:subtitle: Chris Dyer responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about life in the Middle Ages. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In the latest of our series tackling the big questions on major historical topics, historian Chris Dyer responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about life in the Middle Ages, including bodily hygiene, sleep patterns, love and marriage, policing and retirement. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
